CustomField.description:
This field is used to show the Icons for Non Infra Field Workers Schedule List screen on mobile
Created by Vijay for POC of SAL-2809 Updated as a part of SFS-5426 updated as part of sfs-7549
CustomField.formula: IF(OR((FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Water Non Infra"),(FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Waste Non Infra"), (FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Bio Resource")), IF(FSM_ServiceOrderType__c = "ZPM3","‚ùóÔ∏è","") & IF( (FSM_SameStartAppointmentDependencyExists__c = True),"üë¨" ,"") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_MeasuringPointCount__c > 0 ,"üìê",""),"" )
CustomField.label: Icons for Non Infra
